original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
translated: they do not see the perfection of wisdom itself.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /🔽rnam pa thams cad @62a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad @62a *//
translated: they train in the perfection of wisdom by way of nonapprehension.

original: mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: They will go forth to omniscience.

original: mi dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is nonapprehension?

original: gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: When they practice the perfection of generosity,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa nas /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa nas / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: they do not apprehend that perfection of generosity itself.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na /
translated: In the same vein, when they practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not apprehend that perfection of wisdom itself.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de nyid mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar de nyid mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: up to the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended, up to awakening is not apprehended, up to the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: it is in this way that great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing /
translated: train in the transcendent perfection of wisdom, and

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: they will attain emancipation in omniscience.

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Reverend Lord!

original: ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags /
analyzed: ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags /
translated: In what way do they attain emancipation through the non-apprehension of anything?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Śāradvatī­putra!

original: nar stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: nar stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: It is through the non-apprehension of emptiness that they attain emancipation. In the same vein, it is through the non-apprehension of . . .

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo //
translated: up to and including the emptiness of all phenomena, is a going forth that is not apprehended.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: theg pa des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das @62b kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: theg pa des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur lags / bcom ldan 'das @62b kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: from where will that vehicle go forth, and where will that vehicle come to rest?”

original: rab 'byor / theg pa des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / theg pa des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, that vehicle will go forth from the three realms and will go forth to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: de nyid du gnas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de nyid du gnas par 'gyur la /
translated: and it will come to rest right there,

original: de'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: de'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: and that is by way of nonduality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is because those two dharmas—that is, the Great Vehicle and the knowledge of all aspects—are not conjoined and are not disjoined, they are not gross and are not subtle, they are not meager and are not vast, and they are not bright and are not dark.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not non-endowed.

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: It is formless.

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: It is not shown.

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: It is unobstructed.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the same in terms of the characteristic of being without a characteristic.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ni nges par mi 'byung /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ni nges par mi 'byung /
translated: Subhūti, dharmas that are without a characteristic do not go forth,

original: nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
translated: will not go forth,

original: nges par ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and have not gone forth.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: One who wants to go forth from dharmas that are without a characteristic would be one who wants to go forth from the dharma-constituent.

original: de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad cing /
translated: Similarly, one who wants to go forth from dharmas that are without a characteristic would be one who wants to go forth from suchness

original: de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: and would be one who wants to go forth from the very limit of reality.

original: de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //🔽gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la @63a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do // gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la @63a *//
translated: Likewise, whoever wishes to go forth from phenomena that are without defining characteristics simply wishes to go forth from the inconceivable element.

original: nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni /
analyzed: nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni /
translated: Whoever wishes to go forth from phenomena that are without defining characteristics

original: grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: simply wishes to go forth from the perfected and blissful.

original: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni spong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni spong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Whoever wishes to go forth from phenomena that are without defining characteristics simply wishes to go forth from the element of abandonment.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad pa dang / de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang /
analyzed: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad pa dang / de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang /
translated: whoever wishes to go forth from phenomena that are without defining characteristics simply wishes to go forth from the expanse of detachment, the expanse of cessation, and the emptiness of form, and likewise from feeling,

original: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: It is the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that will go forth.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the emptiness of form does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'di ltar rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
translated: it is because form is empty of form,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / @63b gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @63b gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni /
translated: “Subhūti, someone who wants to go forth from dharmas without marks

original: mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: has exhausted going forth from the emptiness of the eyes.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,🔽someone who wants to go forth from dharmas without marks

original: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas /
analyzed: gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas /
translated: has exhausted going forth from the emptiness of the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, and so on up to:

original: de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, and the emptiness of the feelings that arise from the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the emptiness of the eyes does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the condition that is feeling due to sensory contact that is mentally compounded does not transcend the three realms.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the eyes are empty of the eyes, and in the same vein,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang / de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang / de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the condition that is feeling due to sensory contact that is mentally compounded is empty of the condition that is feeling due to sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Su­bhūti, in the same way, one who aspires to deliverance with respect to things that are without defining characteristics merely aspires to deliverance with respect to dreams.

original: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la @64a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la @64a *//
translated: In the same way, phenomena that lack characteristics🔽

original: nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: In the same way, those who want to attain emancipation in phenomena that are without defining characteristics are just the same as those who want to attain emancipation in illusions, mirages, echoes, optical illusions, and tathāgata- emanations.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of dreams does not attain emancipation from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin du sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: In the same way, the intrinsic nature of illusions, mirages, echoes, optical illusions, and tathāgata-emanations does not attain emancipation from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of a dream is empty of the intrinsic nature of a dream,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni /
translated: and so on up to

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the intrinsic nature of a magical creation, a mirage, an echo, an optical illusion, and a tathāgata’s magical creation is empty of the intrinsic nature of a tathāgata’s magical creation.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, anyone who wants to go forth from phenomena that are without a basic nature wants to go forth from the perfection of giving.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par @64b 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par @64b 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, those who want to go forth from phenomena that are without defining characteristics want to go forth from the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the perfection of generosity does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: “Subhūti, similarly, the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom do not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and they do not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the perfection of giving is empty of the intrinsic nature of the perfection of giving,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
translated: and

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / @65a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / @65a *//
translated: Subhūti,

original: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: one who wants to attain emancipation in phenomena that are without a basic nature wants to attain emancipation in the perfection of giving.🔽In the same way, one who wants to attain emancipation in phenomena that are without a basic nature wants to attain emancipation in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: One who wants to attain emancipation in phenomena that are without a basic nature wants to attain emancipation in inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of inner emptiness does not emerge from the three world systems,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin /
translated: and it does not even stand in the knowledge of all things.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both inner and outer phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities do not emerge from the three world systems,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and they do not even stand in the knowledge of all things.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness,

original: de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and in the same vein,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Similarly, whoever wishes to attain emancipation in phenomena that are without defining characteristics

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: has exhausted his wish to attain emancipation in the applications of mindfulness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni @65b khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni @65b khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the applications of mindfulness does not go forth from the three realms

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the applications of mindfulness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the applications of mindfulness.

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
