analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par bstan pa kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And so on up to: just as the noble eightfold path is taught, so too should be applied extensively to the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four correct knowledges, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: @66a *// rab 'byor /
analyzed: @66a *// rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: one who wants to go forth from dharmas without marks

original: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: wants to go forth from an arhat who has exhausted defilements.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on.

original: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: “Subhūti, whoever wants to go forth from dharmas without marks is just wanting to go forth from a pratyekabuddha, and a tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of that, and similarly connecting this,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: the Tathāgata’s essential nature does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Subhūti, it is because of that, and similarly connecting this,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
translated: the essential nature of a worthy one whose defilements have ceased is empty of the essential nature of a worthy one.

original: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
translated: Similarly, the essential nature of a pratyekabuddha is empty of the essential nature of a pratyekabuddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the intrinsic nature of the Tathāgata is empty of the intrinsic nature of the Tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, anyone who wants to go forth from dharmas without marks wants to go forth from the result of stream enterer.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras @66b bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras @66b bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, anyone who wants to go forth from dharmas without marks wants to go forth from the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,🔽Subhūti, it is because the result of stream enterer is empty of the result of stream enterer,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The eightfold noble path should be expanded in the same way as the five aggregates.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, whoever wants to go forth from dharmas without marks only wants to go forth from names.

original: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, whoever wants to go forth from dharmas without marks only wants to go forth from symbols, conventions, and designations.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the emptiness of names does not go forth from the three realms,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and does not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid ni ming gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid ni ming gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nas /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the emptiness of the name is empty of the emptiness of the name.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on up to

original: btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ni btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ni btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the emptiness of the imputed phenomena is empty of the emptiness of the imputed phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, one who wants to go forth through phenomena without defining characteristics only wants to go forth through non-arising.

original: de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang @67a *//
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te / rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang @67a *//
translated: And so on up to

original: yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do //
translated: Subhūti, one who wants to go forth through phenomena without defining characteristics only wants to go forth through non-cessation, signlessness, affliction and purification, and non-conditioning.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and so on.

original: ming gi skabs su ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: ming gi skabs su ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: This should be extensively applied in the same way as was demonstrated in the section on names.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing der yang mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis gnas so //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba las /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing der yang mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis gnas so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba las /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations, the Great Vehicle goes forth from the three realms to the knowledge of all aspects, and it also abides there in a manner of not moving.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: This was the twelfth chapter, “The Concentration of the Heroic Stride,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhuti:

original: rab 'byor / khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
translated: “Subhuti, you have said, ‘Where will that vehicle stand?’

original: rab 'byor / theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Subhuti, that vehicle will not stand anywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gnas pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar gnas pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are non-abiding because abiding is non-apprehensible.

original: 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / dper na; chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / dper na; chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Nevertheless, that vehicle will stand by way of non-standing.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: For example, Subhūti, the dharma-constituent is not standing and is not non-standing.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, the vehicle is also not standing and is not non-standing.

original: le'u @67b gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: le'u @67b gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be extensively connected in the same way as was indicated above.

original: rab 'byor / dper na /🔽skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dper na / skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: For example, Subhūti,

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽de bzhin du theg pa de ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // de bzhin du theg pa de ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: non-production is not standing and is not non-standing.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: The vehicle is also not standing and is not non-standing.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: This should be extensively connected in the same way as was indicated above.

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not a basis because it is not something that can be apprehended, it is not something that can be demonstrated, it is not something that can be expressed, it is not something that can be known, it is not something that can be seen, it is not something that can be heard, it is not something that can be touched, it is not something that can be smelled, it is not something that can be tasted, it is not something that can be conceptualized, it is not something that can be analyzed, it is not something that can be imagined, it is not something that can be thought of, it is not something that can be reflected upon, it is not something that can be sought, it is not something that can be attained, it is not something that can be abandoned, it is not something that can be defiled, it is not something that can be purified, it is not something that can be increased, it is not something that can be decreased, it is not something that can be augmented, it is not something that can be diminished, it is not something that can be accumulated, it is not something that can be dispersed, it is not something that can be produced, it is not something that can be stopped, it is not something that can be characterized, it is not something that can be afflicted, it is not something that can be purified, and it is not something that can be formed.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the absence of cessation, the absence of characteristics, the absence of affliction, the absence of purification, and the absence of performance are not existent and are not nonexistent.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, that vehicle is not existent and is not nonexistent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent is not existent and is not nonexistent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nas /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and in the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: the intrinsic nature of the absence of performance is empty of the intrinsic nature of the absence of performance.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason, that vehicle does not stand anywhere.

original: de'ang mi gnas par gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: de'ang mi gnas par gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: And that is because it does not stand in a way that does not stand.

original: yang rab 'byor /
analyzed: yang rab 'byor /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti,

original: gang 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
translated: you have asked, ‘Who will go forth by means of that vehicle?’

original: rab 'byor / theg pa des su'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / theg pa des su'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, no one will go forth by means of that vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung @68a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung @68a *//
translated: And why is that?🔽Subhūti, it is because all those dharmas—that vehicle, that which would go forth,

original: bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and that to which it would go forth—are non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na /
translated: Thus, when all dharmas are non-existent and non-apprehensible,

original: chos gang zhig gis su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos gang zhig gis su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: by what dharma will anyone go forth?

original: gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Where will they go forth?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag dang de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar bdag dang de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Subhuti : Because of the nonexistence of the own-being of form, etc.

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir bdag gtan mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du sems can dang / skye ba po nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir bdag gtan mi dmigs so // de bzhin du sems can dang / skye ba po nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self is not apprehended at all, and similarly, connect this with each, up to the knower and the seer are not apprehended.

original: shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the self is not apprehended at all, and similarly, connect this with each, up to sentient beings, living creatures, up to the knower and the seer are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the dharma-constituent is not apprehended because of being utterly pure.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Thusness is not apprehended because of being utterly pure.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
translated: The very limit of reality is not apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang khams mi dmigs so //
translated: The inconceivable element is not apprehended because of being utterly pure.🔽The aggregates and constituents are not apprehended because of being utterly pure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams dang skye mched rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams dang skye mched rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The constituents and sense fields are not apprehended because of being utterly pure.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible due to its utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @68b pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @68b pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patient acceptance, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are non-apprehensible due to their utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, inner emptiness is non-apprehensible due to its utter purity.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: In the same vein,🔽external emptiness,🔽internal and external emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness,🔽great emptiness,🔽ultimate emptiness,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence are non-apprehensible due to their utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible due to their utter purity.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar mi dmigs so // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: up to the eightfold noble path is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so // de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
translated: “Because of utter purity, the stream enterer is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, because of utter purity, the once-returner, the non-returner, the arhat, the pratyekabuddha, and the tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: “Because of utter purity, the result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs so //
translated: “Because of utter purity, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of complete purity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i @69a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i @69a *//
translated: Similarly, because of complete purity,

original: phyir / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
translated: non-production, non-cessation, non-affliction, non-purification, and non-conditioning are not apprehended.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of complete purity, the prior limit is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, because of complete purity, the later limit and the present are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, because of complete purity, going, not going, staying, and arising are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Similarly, because of complete purity,

original: 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: diminution and increase are not apprehended.

original: ci zhig dmigs su med pas mi dmigs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig dmigs su med pas mi dmigs she na /
translated: What is not apprehended that is not apprehended?

original: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharma-constituent is non-apprehensible because of not being discerned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of being utterly pure that

original: chos kyi dbyings ni sus kyang ma dmigs /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni sus kyang ma dmigs /
translated: the dharma-constituent is not discerned by anyone,

original: mi dmigs / gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs / gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is not discerned, and will not be discerned by anyone.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this:

original: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible because the dharma-constituent is non-apprehensible, suchness is non-apprehensible, the very limit of reality is non-apprehensible, emptiness is non-apprehensible, and the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible.

original: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is non-apprehensible because it is non-apprehensible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs @69b su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs @69b su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible because it is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible because they are non-existent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are non-apprehensible because they are non-existent.

original: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the stream enterers are non-apprehensible because they are non-existent.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: the genuinely perfect buddhas are non-apprehensible because they are non-existent.

original: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible because it is non-existent.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: the genuinely perfect enlightenment of buddhahood is non-apprehensible because it is non-existent.

original: de bzhin du skye ba med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the absence of birth is non-apprehensible because it is non-existent.🔽Up to the absence of production is non-apprehensible because it is non-existent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du sa dang po dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so // de bzhin du sa dang po dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the unconditioned is non-apprehensible, since it is utterly pure, and therefore it is not discerned.🔽Similarly, the first spiritual level is non-apprehensible, since it is utterly pure, and therefore it is not discerned.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same vein, the tenth spiritual level is non-apprehensible, since it is utterly pure, and therefore it is not discerned.

original: de las bcu po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de las bcu po dag gang zhe na /
translated: If you ask what these ten are,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: they comprise

original: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bya ba byas pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
analyzed: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bya ba byas pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
translated: the spiritual level of bright insight, the spiritual level of buddha nature, the eighth-lowest stage, the stage of insight, the stage of thinning afflictions, the stage of separation from desire, the stage of what needs to be done, the pratyekabuddha stage,

original: byang @70a *// chub sems dpa'i sa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid ni bcu pa'o //
analyzed: byang @70a *// chub sems dpa'i sa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid ni bcu pa'o //
translated: the bodhisattva stage, and the stage of the genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: de la nang stong pa nyid las dang po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de la nang stong pa nyid las dang po dmigs su med do //
translated: In this regard, the first spiritual level is non-apprehensible in the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Similarly, the second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, and tenth levels are non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las dang po dmigs su med pa nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las dang po dmigs su med pa nas /
translated: In the same vein, the emptiness of non-apprehension, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, are non-apprehensible, owing to their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: In the same vein, the ten levels are non-apprehensible, owing to their utter purity.

original: rab 'byor / sa dang po ni sus kyang ma dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sa dang po ni sus kyang ma dmigs /
translated: If you ask why, Su­bhūti, it is because the first level has not been apprehended by anyone,

original: mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mi dmigs te /
translated: and it is non-apprehensible.

original: gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du sus kyang ma dmigs /
analyzed: gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du sus kyang ma dmigs /
translated: It is because the first level has not been apprehended by anyone, and it is non-apprehensible, and it cannot be apprehended by anyone, and in the same way, the ten levels have not been apprehended by anyone,🔽and they are non-apprehensible.🔽It is because the ten levels have not been apprehended by anyone, and they are non-apprehensible, and they cannot be apprehended by anyone, and in the same vein, the emptiness of internal phenomena has not been apprehended by anyone,

original: mi dmigs la /🔽gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs la /🔽gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and it is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi dmigs pa nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs so // de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi dmigs pa nas /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, one does not observe the bringing of sentient beings to maturity in inner emptiness, and one does not observe the bringing of sentient beings to maturity in up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs @70b su dag par bya ba mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la mig lnga mi dmigs pa nas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs @70b su dag par bya ba mi dmigs so // de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la mig lnga mi dmigs pa nas /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, one does not observe the purification of a buddhafield in inner emptiness, and one does not observe the purification of a buddhafield in up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mig lnga mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mig lnga mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, one does not observe the five eyes in inner emptiness, and one does not observe the five eyes in up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: with the method of not apprehending any phenomena go forth to the knowledge of all aspects by means of the Great Vehicle.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: theg pa chen po /
analyzed: theg pa chen po /
translated: the Great Vehicle,

original: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so;/
analyzed: theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so;/
translated: the Great Vehicle, will go forth after outshining the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.”

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
translated: as I understand the meaning of what the Lord has said,

original: theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: that Great Vehicle is equal to space.

original: dper na / nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so //
translated: For example, in space, coming, going, and abiding are not evident.

original: de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa mi mngon lags so //
translated: In the same way, in the Great Vehicle, coming, going, and abiding are not evident.

original: dper na / nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs shing /
translated: For example, in space, the prior limit is not evident.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs lags so //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs lags so //
translated: The later limit and the middle are not evident.

original: de bzhin du theg pa de la'ang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' dang // @71a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du theg pa de la'ang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' dang // @71a *//
translated: In the same way, in the Great Vehicle, the prior limit is not evident.

original: dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: The later limit and the middle are not evident.

original: dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas de'i slad du theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas de'i slad du theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: Because it is beyond the three times, that vehicle is called the Great Vehicle.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The Lord having said that,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Lord, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste; des na theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste; des na theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This vehicle is equal to space, and so the Great Vehicle outshines and leads to the transcendence of the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa de ni /
translated: “Subhūti, the vehicle of the bodhisattvas

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: the six perfections.

original: drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this is called the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ni /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no //
translated: it is the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: @71b gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad de /
analyzed: @71b gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad de /
translated: it is all the dhāraṇī gateways, all the gateways of meditative stabilization, and all meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the heroic meditative stabilization, and in the same vein,

original: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol la gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol la gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin no //
translated: up to and including the meditative stabilization of space-like non-attachment, liberation, and absence of obscuration.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, and in the same vein,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, and in the same vein,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yin no ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yin no ////
translated: up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽Noble Mahāyāna Sūtra

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in a Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu gsum pa /
translated: The thirteenth section

original: yang rab 'byor /
analyzed: yang rab 'byor /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti,

original: 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas /
analyzed: 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas /
translated: you have said that this vehicle will surpass the world with its gods, humans, and asuras

original: nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la /
analyzed: nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la /
translated: and go forth.

original: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten de gang zhe na /
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten de gang zhe na /
translated: What is this world with its gods, humans, and asuras?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so //
translated: the world of the desire realm, the world of the form realm, and the world of the formless realm.

original: rab 'byor / gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, if the desire realm were to exist as it is imagined,

original: ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la /
analyzed: ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la /
translated: It is unmistaken, not otherwise, not erroneous, correct, true, as it is, permanent, stable, enduring, and not subject to change.

original: @72a *// dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: @72a *// dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If it were not a non-thing, this supreme Great Vehicle would not surpass and go beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni brtags pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni brtags pa /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the desire realm is imagined,

original: rnam par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: rnam par bsgrubs pa /
translated: constructed,

original: tshig gis bstan pa ste /
analyzed: tshig gis bstan pa ste /
translated: and taught with words,

original: mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te /
translated: and it is impermanent, unstable, not enduring, and subject to change.

original: dngos po med pa'i bar du yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i bar du yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po /
translated: It is because it is a non-thing that this Great Vehicle surpasses and goes beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung ngo //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams nas de bzhin du 'gyur te /🔽ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la /
analyzed: theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung ngo // rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams nas de bzhin du 'gyur te / ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la /
translated: This supreme vehicle, the Great Vehicle, will transcend the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.🔽Su­bhūti, in the same way, the element of form and the formless element are also unmistaken, unaltered, not erroneous, genuine, true, real, permanent, stable, eternal, and not subject to change.

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni; theg pa chen po /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni; theg pa chen po /

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the speech of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly accomplished Buddha endowed with sixty aspects were a thing,

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /🔽rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @78a *//
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na / rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @78a *//
translated: If the speech of the Tathagata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, endowed with the sixty branches, were not a non-entity,🔽Subhuti, then the speech of the Tathagata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, endowed with the sixty branches, would not be understood in the innumerable, countless world systems of the ten directions.

original: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But because the speech of the Tathagata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, endowed with the sixty branches, is a non-entity, therefore the speech of the Tathagata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, endowed with the sixty branches, is understood in the innumerable, countless world systems of the ten directions.

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One were a thing

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam /
translated: then the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One would not turn the wheel of the Dharma in the world that has not been turned by any ascetic,

original: bram ze'am / tshangs pa'am /🔽sus kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor bskor bar mi 'gyur bzhig na /
analyzed: bram ze'am / tshangs pa'am / sus kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor bskor bar mi 'gyur bzhig na /
translated: brāhmaṇa, god,🔽demon, Brahmā, or anyone else.

original: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med pas /
translated: Subhūti, because the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One is not a thing,

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngon dge sbyong ngam /
translated: therefore the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One turns the wheel of the Dharma in the world that has not been turned by any ascetic,

original: bram za'am / tshangs pa'am /
analyzed: bram za'am / tshangs pa'am /
translated: brāhmaṇa, god,🔽demon, Brahmā, or anyone else.

original: sus kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: sus kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: up to “no one” means that he turns the wheel of Dharma that no one has turned.

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can thams cad dngos po yin te; dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can thams cad dngos po yin te; dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: Subhūti, if all those beings for whose sake the Tathāgata turns the wheel of Dharma were existent, not nonexistent,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das @78b par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das @78b par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then the Tathāgata would not have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag thams cad dngos po med pas /🔽de'i phyir sems can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gi ched du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag thams cad dngos po med pas / de'i phyir sems can de dag thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
translated: Subhūti, it is because all those beings for whose sake the Tathāgata turns the wheel of Dharma are nonexistent,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
translated: therefore all those beings have gone to, are going to, and will go to the realm of nirvāṇa that has no remainder of the skandhas.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain complete nirvāṇa.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lags so zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lags so zhes smras pa ni /
translated: “Subhūti, you said that this vehicle is equal to space.

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /

translated: Subhūti, the awakening, the nature of awakening, the suchness of awakening, the essential nature of awakening, and the essential nature of the essential nature of awakening do not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /🔽gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /🔽gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor /
translated: do not go anywhere,🔽and do not even abide anywhere.

original: sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: the Buddha, the nature of the Buddha, the suchness of the Buddha, the essential nature of the Buddha, and the essential nature of the Buddha’s attributes do not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /
translated: do not go anywhere,

original: gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor /
analyzed: gang na'ang gnas pa med pa dang / rab 'byor /
translated: and do not even stand anywhere.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med /
translated: Subhūti, the compounded element, the nature of the compounded element, the suchness of the compounded element, the essential nature of the compounded element, and the essential nature of the compounded element’s attributes do not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med /
translated: do not go anywhere,

original: gang na'ang @85b gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang na'ang @85b gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and do not even stand anywhere.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: “Subhūti, when you say ‘that vehicle,’ you cannot apprehend its past end,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: you cannot apprehend its future end,🔽and

original: dbus kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: The middle is also non-apprehensible.

original: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par gnas pas /
analyzed: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par gnas pas /
translated: That vehicle is perfectly present in the equality of the three times.

original: de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras pa ni /
translated: Therefore, that vehicle is called the Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: In that Great Vehicle, the prior limit is not apprehended,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs /
translated: the later limit is not apprehended,

original: dbus kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: and the middle is not apprehended.

original: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rnam par gnas pas de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rnam par gnas pas de'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: That vehicle is perfectly present in the equality of the three times. Therefore, that vehicle is called the Great Vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar 'das pa'i dus ni 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /🔽ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus ni 'das pa'i dus kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because the past is empty of the past,🔽the future is empty of the future,

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus ni da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus ni da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /
translated: and the present is empty of the present.

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /
translated: the sameness of the three times is empty of the sameness of the three times,

original: theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos stong /
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos stong /
translated: the Great Vehicle is empty of the Great Vehicle,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the bodhisattva is empty of the bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid ni gcig ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid ni gcig ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, emptiness is not one,

original: gnyis ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis ma yin /
translated: not two,

original: gsum ma yin /
analyzed: gsum ma yin /
translated: not three,

original: bzhi ma yin /🔽lnga ma yin zhing /
analyzed: bzhi ma yin / lnga ma yin zhing /
translated: not four,🔽not five,

original: tha dad pa'ang med do //
analyzed: tha dad pa'ang med do //
translated: and it is not differentiated.

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattvas, the sameness of the three times.

original: de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, sameness and difference are not apprehended.

original: 'dod chags @86a *//
analyzed: 'dod chags @86a *//
translated: Attachment is not apprehended.🔽Nonattachment is not apprehended.🔽Aversion is not apprehended.

original: dang 'dod chags dang bral ba mi dmigs so //🔽zhe sdang dang zhe sdang dang bral ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dang 'dod chags dang bral ba mi dmigs so // zhe sdang dang zhe sdang dang bral ba mi dmigs so //
translated: Non-aversion is not apprehended.🔽Delusion is not apprehended.🔽Non-delusion is not apprehended.🔽Pride is not apprehended.

original: gti mug dang gti mug dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gti mug dang gti mug dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal yang mi dmigs so //
translated: Non-pride is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on.

original: dge ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / lung du bstan pa rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / lung du bstan pa rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend virtuous or nonvirtuous dharmas, nor does he apprehend those that are determinate or indeterminate.

original: rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so //🔽bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin /🔽bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so // bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin / bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is permanent or impermanent.

original: de la ni bdag dang bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so //🔽de la ni 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni bdag dang bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so // de la ni 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend what is happy or painful, nor does he apprehend what is a self or not a self.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so //🔽'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so // 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the desire realm, nor does he apprehend the form realm or the formless realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend passing beyond the desire realm, nor does he apprehend passing beyond the form realm or the formless realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar dngos po med pa ni dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po med pa ni dmigs su med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because a nonexistent thing is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong /
translated: Subhuti: Past form, past form is empty of past form.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong /
translated: Future form, future form is empty of future form.

original: da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Present form, present form is empty of present form.

original: de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par @86b shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par @86b shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: Past feeling, perception, and the formations, past consciousness, past consciousness is empty of past consciousness.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong /
translated: Future consciousness, future consciousness is empty of future consciousness.

original: da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir te /
translated: Present consciousness, present consciousness is empty of present consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: Subhuti: In emptiness, past form is not apprehended,

original: 'das pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'das pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la /
translated: past form is empty of past form.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
translated: And how could emptiness apprehend emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could past form be apprehended in emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: In emptiness, future and present form are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is also empty and not apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could future and present form be apprehended in emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
translated: In emptiness, past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /
translated: Since emptiness is also empty and not apprehended,

original: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness be apprehended in emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de /
translated: In emptiness, future and present feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are non-apprehensible.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na /🔽stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da @87a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pas dmigs su med na / stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dang / da @87a *//
translated: Since emptiness is also emptiness, it is non-apprehensible.

original: ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could future and present feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness be apprehended in emptiness?

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Su­bhūti, the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible in the limit of the past.

original: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible in the limit of the future and in the present.
