original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te /
translated: Su­bhūti, the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible in the sameness of the three times.

original: rab 'byor / chos mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so //
translated: Su­bhūti, in the sameness of phenomena, the past time is non-apprehensible,

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs so //
translated: the future and the present are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / re zhig mnyam pa nyid la ni mnyam pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / re zhig mnyam pa nyid la ni mnyam pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
translated: Subhūti, in the state of sameness, even sameness is not apprehended,

original: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the past time be apprehended in the state of sameness?

original: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: Similarly, how could the future and the present times be apprehended?

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o /
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom should be applied in the same way as the perfection of generosity was explained above.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the applications of mindfulness are not apprehended in the past,

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs @87b so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs @87b so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the right efforts,🔽the legs of miraculous power,🔽the faculties,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the powers,🔽the seven branches of enlightenment,🔽and the noble eightfold path are not found in the past,🔽the noble eightfold path is not found in the future, and the noble eightfold path is not found in the present.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble eightfold path is not found in the equality of the three times.🔽Subhūti, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not found in the past,🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not found in the future, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not found in the present.🔽The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not found in the equality of the three times.🔽Subhūti, the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the past,

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the future, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the present.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the equality of the three times.🔽Subhūti, the perfection of giving is not found in the past,🔽the perfection of giving is not found in the future, and the perfection of giving is not found in the present.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so; ;rab 'byor /
translated: The perfection of giving is not found in the equality of the three times.🔽Subhūti, the perfection of morality,🔽the perfection of patience,🔽the perfection of perseverance,🔽the perfection of concentration,🔽and the perfection of wisdom are not found in the past,🔽the perfection of wisdom is not found in the future, and the perfection of wisdom is not found in the present.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not found in the equality of the three times.🔽Subhūti, the emptiness of emptiness,🔽the emptiness of great extent,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽and the emptiness of conditioned phenomena are not found in the past,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not found in the future, and the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not found in the present.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not found in the equality of the three times

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the past.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the future or in the present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the ordinary person is not apprehended in the past.

original: de bzhin du so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the ordinary person is not apprehended in the future or in the present.

original: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: The ordinary person is not apprehended in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: it is because sentient beings are non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same vein, as before,🔽the śrāvakas are not apprehended in the past.

original: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The śrāvakas are not apprehended in the future.

original: nyan thos ni da ltar byung @88a *//🔽bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos ni da ltar byung @88a *// bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The śrāvaka is not apprehended in the present.

original: de bzhin du nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: The śrāvaka is not apprehended in the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same way, the pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva, and the tathāgata, arhat, perfectly complete buddha are not apprehended in the past.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so //
translated: The tathāgata, arhat, perfectly complete buddha is not apprehended in the future or in the present.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: The tathāgata is not apprehended in the three times.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because sentient beings are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dus gsum po dag la bslabs la /
analyzed: dus gsum po dag la bslabs la /
translated: train in the three times

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: and complete the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings called the sameness of the three times.

original: de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo ////
analyzed: de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo ////
translated: Abiding in that, the bodhisattva great beings surpass the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha @88b rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha @88b rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu bzhi pa /🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bam po bcu bzhi pa / de nas bcom ldan 'das la / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Book Fourteen🔽Then the Lord🔽the venerable Subhūti said this to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bka' stsal pa ni legs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bka' stsal pa ni legs so //
translated: The Blessed One has well proclaimed the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: legs so // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: legs so // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po /
analyzed: 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings of the past,

original: theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob lags so //
analyzed: theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob lags so //
translated: having trained in this very Great Vehicle, the supreme vehicle, attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po /
translated: the bodhisattvas of the future,

original: theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: theg pa rab mchog 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
translated: having trained in this very Great Vehicle, the supreme vehicle, will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis pa gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /🔽chad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis pa gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis / grangs ma mchis / chad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po /
translated: The immeasurable bodhisattva great beings of the present who are in the countless,

original: theg pa rab mchog 'di la bslabs nas /
analyzed: theg pa rab mchog 'di la bslabs nas /
translated: immeasurable, and limitless world systems of the ten directions have also trained in this supreme vehicle, the Great Vehicle,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob lags te /
translated: and have attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Therefore, Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so //
analyzed: de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags so //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @89a *//🔽la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @89a *// la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te /
translated: “That is so, Su­bhūti!

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: That is so, Su­bhūti!

original: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo //
translated: “Subhūti, past bodhisattva great beings trained in just this Great Vehicle and subsequently attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa de dag kyang /
translated: Those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas who will appear in the future will also train in just this Great Vehicle and subsequently attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo //
translated: Those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas who are now living in infinite, countless, immeasurable world systems in the ten directions have also trained in just this Great Vehicle and subsequently attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the venerable Su­bhūti:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog par byed /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog par byed /
translated: how do they investigate these phenomena?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang yin /
translated: What is a bodhisattva great being?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin /
translated: What is the transcendent perfection of wisdom?

original: @89b nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin /🔽de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: @89b nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: What is the investigation?🔽” The venerable Su­bhūti replied to the venerable Śāradvatī­putra as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra!

original: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: And if you ask, What is a bodhisattva? a bodhisattva is one who is a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: By means of that awakening, he knows the aspects of all dharmas,

original: chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do //
analyzed: chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on those dharmas.

original: smras pa / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: smras pa / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: He said, What are those aspects of all dharmas that he knows,

original: chos de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa de gang dag yin /
analyzed: chos de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa de gang dag yin /
translated: but on which he does not settle down?

original: smras pa / gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: smras pa / gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: He said, He knows the aspects of form,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but does not settle down on it.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te /
translated: Similarly, he knows the aspects of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but does not settle down on them.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on as before.

original: skye mched kyi bar gyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: skye mched kyi bar gyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: He knows the aspects of the sense fields,

original: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but does not settle down on them.

original: de bzhin du khams rnams kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du khams rnams kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: In the same way, he knows the aspects of the constituents,

original: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: In the same way, he knows the aspects of the applications of mindfulness,

original: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to🔽he knows the aspects of the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and in the same way, he knows the aspects of the ten tathāgata powers, and in the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi rnam pa shes te /
translated: he knows the aspects of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: but he does not settle down on them.

original: smras pa / tshe dang @90a *//
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang @90a *//
translated: Śāriputra then said,

original: ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te /
translated: what are the aspects of all dharmas that bodhisattva great beings know

original: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin /
analyzed: de dag la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin /
translated: and on which they do not settle down?”🔽Subhūti replied,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste /
translated: “What are the aspects, what are the signs, and what are the indications by which phenomena are apprehended?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: gzugs rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs rnams sam /
translated: forms,

original: sgra rnams sam /🔽dri rnams sam /🔽ro rnams sam /
analyzed: sgra rnams sam / dri rnams sam / ro rnams sam /
translated: sounds,🔽smells,🔽tastes,

original: reg rnams sam /🔽chos rnams sam /
analyzed: reg rnams sam / chos rnams sam /
translated: tactile objects,🔽and mental phenomena,

original: phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kyi bar dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kyi bar dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos 'dzin pa ste /
translated: up to and including internal and external phenomena.

original: rnam pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows them correctly and as they are.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: when you ask, ‘What is this perfection of wisdom?’

original: blo gros de ring du song ba yin te /
analyzed: blo gros de ring du song ba yin te /
translated: it is because the mind has gone far.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: smras pa / gang las ring du song ba yin /
analyzed: smras pa / gang las ring du song ba yin /
translated: ” He said, “From what has it gone far?”

original: smras pa / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: She said, “Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is as follows:

original: phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams las ring du song /
analyzed: phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams las ring du song /
translated: It is far removed from the aggregates, the elements, and the sense bases.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams las ring du song /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams las ring du song /
translated: It is far removed from all the afflictions and from the views.

original: 'gro ba drug po dag las ring du song ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba drug po dag las ring du song ste /
translated: It is far removed from the six destinies.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @90b pa las ring du song /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @90b pa las ring du song /
translated: It is far removed from the perfections of generosity, morality, patience, diligence, and concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ste /
translated: It is far removed from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing /
translated: Similarly, it is far removed from inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste /
translated: up to far removed from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las ring du song ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las ring du song ste /
translated: They have gone far from the applications of mindfulness, up to the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, and similarly, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du song ste /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du song ste /
translated: They have gone far from the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

original: de ni ring du song ba yin te /
analyzed: de ni ring du song ba yin te /
translated: it is gone far,

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and therefore it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa de ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa de ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: when you ask, ‘What is the investigation?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs bde zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /🔽gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin /
translated: do not form mental constructs about the notion that physical forms are happiness.🔽They do not form mental constructs about the notion that physical forms are suffering, or that they are neither suffering nor happiness,

original: bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: or that they are permanent or impermanent.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /🔽@91a *// gzugs bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te / @91a *// gzugs bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang /
translated: In the same vein as before,🔽they do not form mental constructs about the notion that physical forms are a self or not a self, are empty or not empty, have signs or are signless, are anything to be hoped for or are nothing to be hoped for, are calm or not calm,

original: dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /
analyzed: dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /
translated: or are void or not void.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag tu nye bar mi rtog pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag tu nye bar mi rtog pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, he does not form concepts about feelings, perceptions, volitional formations, and consciousness, up to and including the knowledge of all modes.

original: dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go /🔽de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas /
analyzed: dben pa dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas /
translated: He does not form concepts about them as being empty or not empty, as having an own-being or not having an own-being, as being attractive or unattractive.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, he should apply this to the perfection of giving, up to the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, he should apply this to inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of own-being.

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, he should apply this to the applications of mindfulness, up to the noble eightfold path, up to the ten powers of a Tathagata, up to the eighteen special attributes of a Buddha.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya ba nas /
translated: In the same way, it should be applied to all phenomena.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it should be applied to all the doors of meditative stabilization and all the doors of dhāraṇī.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang @91b ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang @91b ma yin /
translated: In the same way, the knowledge of all aspects is not conceptualized as permanent or impermanent, and in the same way, as blissful or suffering, not suffering or not not-suffering,

original: bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
translated: as a self or not a self, as empty or not empty, as with signs or signless, as having aspirations or lacking aspirations, as calm or not calm,

original: ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bya ba'i bar du mi rtog ste /
analyzed: ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bya ba'i bar du mi rtog ste /
translated: or as void or not void.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: de ltar chos thams cad la nye bar rtog par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad la nye bar rtog par byed do //
translated: examines all phenomena in that way.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this had been said, the venerable Śāradvatī­putra asked the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags /
translated: Why is it that you say, ‘The non-arising of physical forms is not physical form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: and the non-arising of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness is not consciousness’?

original: de bzhin du ci'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du ci'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni /
translated: Similarly, why is it that you say, ‘The non-arising of , up to and including omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags zhes smra /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags zhes smra /
translated: is not omniscience’?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Subhūti having said that,🔽the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to him,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: form is empty of form.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te /
translated: the emptiness of form is not form.

original: gzugs ni skye ba med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @92a *//
analyzed: gzugs ni skye ba med do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @92a *//
translated: Form is non-arising.🔽Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: ti'i bu / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: ti'i bu / rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
translated: the non-arising of form is not form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
translated: the emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa ni skye ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni skye ba med do //
translated: Consciousness is non-arising.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: due to this one of many explanations, that which is the non-production of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do //
translated: That emptiness is not the perfection of giving; it is non-production.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma yin te skye ba med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma yin te skye ba med do //
translated: That emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom up to the perfection of generosity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: by this one of many explanations,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: the non-production of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this as before,

original: nang stong pa nyid la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar @92b bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar @92b bya'o //
translated: and apply it extensively to inner emptiness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te /
translated: by this one of many explanations, the non-production of form is not form.

original: skye ba'ang med do //
analyzed: skye ba'ang med do //
translated: There is no production.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the non-production of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: skye ba'ang med do //
analyzed: skye ba'ang med do //
translated: There is no production.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, the non-production of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: skye ba'ang med do //🔽de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: skye ba'ang med do // de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: There is no production.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: The venerable Śāradvatī­putra then asked the venerable Su­bhūti, “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Why is it that you say, ‘The absence of physical forms is not physical forms.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin pa nas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin pa nas /
translated: The absence of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness is not consciousness,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: and in the same vein,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes smra /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes smra /
translated: the absence of , up to and including omniscience, is not omniscience’?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: What is the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind?🔽What is the suchness of a form?🔽What is the suchness of a sound, a smell, a taste, a feeling, and a dharma?🔽What is the suchness of the eye consciousness?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu; de bzhin du 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu; de bzhin du 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: What is the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousnesses?🔽What is the suchness of the eye contact?🔽What is the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact?🔽What is the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact?🔽What is the suchness of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact?

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin @93a *//
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin @93a *//
translated: What is the suchness of the constituents?🔽What is the suchness of the sense fields?🔽What is the suchness of the four concentrations?🔽What is the suchness of the four immeasurables?

original: zhing / gzugs med pa /🔽bstan du med pa /
analyzed: zhing / gzugs med pa / bstan du med pa /
translated: What is the suchness of the four formless absorptions?🔽What is the suchness of the perfection of giving?🔽What is the suchness of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom?🔽What is the suchness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening?🔽What is the suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas?

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: What is the suchness of the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects?

original: 'di ltar mchan nyid med par mchan nyid gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mchan nyid med par mchan nyid gcig pa yin no //
translated: What is the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all bases?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all kinds of existents?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of the aspects of the path?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all bases?🔽What is the suchness of the knowledge of all kinds of existents?

original: de bzhin du 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: In the same way, whatever is non-decreasing, and whatever is feeling, whatever is perception, whatever are volitional factors, and whatever is consciousness, and whatever is the indivisibility of these, all these dharmas are not conjoined and not disjoined;

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /
translated: they are not manifest and not unmanifest;

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: they are formless,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: have no obstruction,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin no //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin no // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and are of a single mark—that is, of no mark.

original: phung po rnams kyi skabs su ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phung po rnams kyi skabs su ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the constituents and sense fields should be connected in detail, just as was done in the case of the aggregates.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the knowledge of all aspects should be connected in detail.

original: che dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: che dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no; ;de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no; ;de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni / rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the non-decrease of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not consciousness.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //🔽de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe @93b dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no // de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe @93b dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Similarly, the non-decrease of , up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti then inquired of him,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni /
translated: why is it that what is called ‘form’

original: 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: is counted as a non-decrease?

original: de bzhin du tshor ba zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so //
translated: Similarly, whatever is called ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional formations,’ and ‘consciousness’ is reckoned as a non-decreasing number.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar gang lags pa de ni 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar gang lags pa de ni 'grib pa ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra /
translated: up to whatever is called ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ is reckoned as a non-decreasing number.”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Subhūti having said that, the venerable Śāradvatī­putra asked,

original: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, is form not one thing

original: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: and nonproduction another,🔽and is nonproduction itself form

original: gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o //
translated: and is form itself nonproduction?

original: de bzhin du tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Similarly, is feeling not one thing,🔽and perception another,🔽and volitional formations another,

original: 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and consciousness another,🔽and nonproduction another?

original: 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: “Form is not one thing, and non-production another;

original: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la /
translated: feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not one thing, and non-production another.

original: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o //
translated: Non-production is not one thing, and form another;🔽form itself is non-production.

original: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Non-production is itself form.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: by this one of many explanations, that which is called ‘form’ is counted as non-decrease.

original: de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams zhes @94a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams zhes @94a *//
translated: Similarly, that which is called ‘feeling, perception, and volitional factors,’

original: bya ba de dang / gang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba de dang / gang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: and that which is called ‘consciousness’ is counted as non-decrease.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽thusness is not one thing, and non-production another;

original: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: non-production is not one thing, and thusness another.

original: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
translated: The very absence of production is the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa nyid yin no //
translated: The very knowledge of all modes is the very absence of production.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni /
translated: by this one of many explanations, that which is called the knowledge of all modes

original: 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'grib pa med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no //
translated: is reckoned as the non-diminution.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: btsun ba bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun ba bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos 'di dag la nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe /
translated: investigate these dharmas,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: they see form as not produced, because of its utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du bdag skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du bdag skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of a self.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: @94b shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bang du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: @94b shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bang du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of one who knows and one who sees.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see the non-arising of the perfection of giving, up to the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, for the sake of their utter purity, they see the applications of mindfulness as unarisen.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, for the sake of their utter purity, they see , up to and including the noble eightfold path, as unarisen.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, for the sake of their utter purity, they see the ten powers of the tathāgatas as unarisen.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: For the sake of their utter purity, they see the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as unarisen.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see all the meditative stabilizations and all the dhāraṇī gateways as non-arisen.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //🔽de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba ma @95a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so // de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba ma @95a *//
translated: Because of being utterly pure, they see up to the knowledge of all aspects as non-arisen.

original: mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see the dharmas of ordinary people as non-arisen.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Because of being utterly pure, they see ordinary people as non-arisen.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, they see the dharmas of the stream enterer, the stream enterers, the dharmas of the once-returner, the once-returners, the dharmas of the non-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
translated: the non-returners, the dharmas of the arhat, the arhats, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddha, the pratyekabuddhas, the dharmas of the bodhisattva, the bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: and the dharmas of the Buddha, and the Buddhas as non-arising.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong lags so //
translated: Because of being utterly pure, they see the perfect Buddha as non-arising.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na /
analyzed: che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, when I understand the meaning of what you have said,

original: gzugs ni ma skyes pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs ni ma skyes pa yin /
translated: form is unproduced,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma skyes pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma skyes pa yin /
translated: and similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are unproduced.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar du ma skyes pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar du ma skyes pa yin /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: sangs @95b rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs @95b rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma skyes pa yin no //
translated: enlightenment is unproduced, and the buddhadharmas are unproduced.

original: de ltar gyur na ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i bar dag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid phyis 'thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i bar dag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid phyis 'thob par 'gyur /
translated: If that is so, then stream enterers would later attain the result of stream enterer, and similarly, up to those who are worthy ones would later attain their state of being a worthy one.

original: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob zin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin pa kho nar 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob zin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin pa kho nar 'gyur /
translated: Likewise, those in the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas would have already attained their pratyekabuddha enlightenment, and the bodhisattva great beings would have already attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'gro ba lnga po'ang bye brag med par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga po'ang bye brag med par 'gyur /
translated: The five types of transmigrators would be undifferentiated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong ba med par yang byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong ba med par yang byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva great beings would have already attained the five types of enlightenment without having seen them.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na ni /🔽ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na ni / ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: if all phenomena are non-arisen,🔽why do those who desire the fruit of stream enterer meditate on the path in order to abandon the three fetters?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Why do those who desire the fruit of once-returner meditate on the path in order to abandon attachment, aversion, and delusion?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Those who seek the fruit of non-return should cultivate the path in order to abandon the fetters that correspond to the lower realms.

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnams kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya /
translated: Those who seek the fruit of arhatship should cultivate the path in order to abandon the five fetters that correspond to the higher realms.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: 'du byed thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes rang @96a *//
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes rang @96a *//
translated: All conditioned things are dependently arisen.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgom par bya /
translated: One should cultivate the path of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: yang ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing /
translated: Why do bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice austerities

original: sems can rnams kyi ched du sdug bsngal 'bum dag kyang nyams su myong /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ched du sdug bsngal 'bum dag kyang nyams su myong /
translated: and experience hundreds of thousands of sufferings for the sake of sentient beings?

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: And why?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why did the Tathāgata fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
translated: The Tathāgata has turned the wheel of the Dharma.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The venerable Subhūti then said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: kho bo ni ma skyes pa'i chos la btags pa mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kho bo ni ma skyes pa'i chos la btags pa mi 'dod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra, I do not assert that something unarisen is a designation.

original: skye ba med pa la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do; ;de bzhin du skye ba med pa la dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do; ;de bzhin du skye ba med pa la dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that nonarising is the stream enterer or the result of stream enterer. Similarly, I do not assert that nonarising is the arhat or the result of arhat.

original: skye ba med pa la rang sangs rgyas dang / rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa la rang sangs rgyas dang / rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: I do not assert that nonarising is the pratyekabuddha or the pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
