translated: Divine princes!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni brjod du med cing bsnyad du med pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni brjod du med cing bsnyad du med pa yin te /
translated: The enlightenment of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas is inexpressible and indescribable.

original: de ni sus kyang thos pa med cing rnam par shes pa'ang med do //
analyzed: de ni sus kyang thos pa med cing rnam par shes pa'ang med do //
translated: No one has heard it or understood it.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: de'i phyir gang su dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa'am /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis bzod pa 'di la ma brten par gnas pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang su dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa'am / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis bzod pa 'di la ma brten par gnas pa'am /
translated: therefore, those who wish to stand in the result of stream enterer

original: mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //🔽de bzhin du gang su dag dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so // de bzhin du gang su dag dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'am /
translated: or wish to actualize the result of stream enterer cannot do so without relying on this acceptance.🔽Similarly, those who wish to stand in the state of a worthy one

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dag dang / de bzhin du rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dag dang / de bzhin du rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa'am /
translated: or wish to actualize the state of a worthy one, and similarly those who wish to stand in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening

original: rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa'am /🔽yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'di lam brten par gnas pa'am /
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa'am / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'di lam brten par gnas pa'am /
translated: Those who wish to actualize the pratyekabuddha enlightenment, or to abide in the perfect enlightenment,

original: mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //
translated: or to actualize the perfect enlightenment, they also cannot abide in this acceptance, or actualize it.

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad thos pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @115a *//
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad thos pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @115a *//
translated: O sons of gods!

original: la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: la gnas par bya'o //
translated: From the first production of the thought of enlightenment, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva should abide in the perfection of wisdom in this way, because of the non-existence of hearing and the inexpressibility.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o ////
translated: the chapter called “The Perfection of Patience” is the fifteenth.

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Then the sons of gods thought this:

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'dod par bya ba yin zhig gu snyam mo //
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'dod par bya ba yin zhig gu snyam mo //
translated: What kind of Dharma teaching should I give to those gods?

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems sems kyis shes nas /🔽lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems sems kyis shes nas / lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti, knowing in his own mind the thoughts occurring to those gods,🔽said to those gods,

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽kho bo'i chos bstan pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin zhing /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / kho bo'i chos bstan pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin zhing /
translated: “Divine princes,🔽you should regard my Dharma teaching as being like an illusion,

original: kho bo la chos nyan pa dag kyang rgyu ma lta bur 'dod par bya ste /
analyzed: kho bo la chos nyan pa dag kyang rgyu ma lta bur 'dod par bya ste /
translated: and you should regard those who listen to the Dharma as being like an illusion.

original: chos bstan pa de ni thos par yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: chos bstan pa de ni thos par yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: That Dharma teaching is not heard,

original: mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and it is not actualized.

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: ” Then those gods said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci sems can de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin la /
analyzed: ci sems can de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin la /
translated: are those sentient beings also like an illusion,

original: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin nam /
analyzed: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin nam /
translated: and is the Dharma teaching for them also like an illusion?

original: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyang sprul pa lta bu dag yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyang sprul pa lta bu dag yin la /
translated: In the same way, sentient beings are like magical creations.

original: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sprul pa lta bu dag yin nam /
analyzed: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sprul pa lta bu dag yin nam /
translated: And the teaching of the Dharma to them is also like a magical creation?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: The venerable Subhūti said,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes!

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just so!

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you say.

original: sems can rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin la /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin la /
translated: Sentient beings are like illusions.

original: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: de dag la chos bstan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: And the teaching of the Dharma to them is also like an illusion.

original: sems can rnams ni sprul pa lta bu dag yin la /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni sprul pa lta bu dag yin la /
translated: Sentient beings are like magical creations.

original: @115b de dag chos bstan pa'ang sprul pa lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: @115b de dag chos bstan pa'ang sprul pa lta bu dag yin no //
translated: And the teaching of the Dharma to them is also like a magical creation.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes!

original: bdag kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin la /
analyzed: bdag kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin la /
translated: I too am like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes!

original: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
translated: Form is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
translated: In the same way, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin mig kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin mig kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
translated: Likewise, the eye is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
translated: Likewise, the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, and the mind are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Sons of gods,

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: form is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: Likewise, sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Sons of gods,

original: mig gi khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: mig gi khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: the eye constituent is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: Likewise, the form constituent and the eye consciousness constituent, the ear constituent, the sound constituent, the ear consciousness constituent, the nose constituent, the smell constituent, the nose consciousness constituent,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: the tongue element, the tastes element, and the tongue consciousness element; the body element, the tangible-object element, and the body consciousness element; the thinking-mind element, the dharma element, and the thinking-mind consciousness element are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg @116a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg @116a *//
translated: Similarly, the eye contact element,

original: pha nas / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas /
analyzed: pha nas / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas /
translated: up to the mind contact element, and similarly, the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dag kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dag kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: up to the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact, are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes!

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all intrinsic natures,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities, and the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Sons of gods,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin no //
translated: In the same way, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the aspects of awakening, and the noble eightfold path are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang rmi lam lta bu @116b sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang rmi lam lta bu @116b sgyu ma lta bu dag yin no //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are also like a dream, like an illusion.
